kizuna_ecology_d_02:
I see you’ve already registered 200 species of
Pokémon to your Pokédex for me![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_03:
Wow! Pokémon from the mountains! Pokémon
from the sea! Wait, what?! No way!\r
You even found Pokémon in a place like this?![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_04: Ah...sorry about that. I got a little excited there.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_05:
My Pokémon research is moving along
super-duper splendidly thanks to you![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_06:
Here, take this. Consider it my way of saying
thanks.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_07:
You’re a bona fide Pokémon catching
professional, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_08:
For your next goal, it’s finally time to go for a
completed Pokédex! Aim for 400 species![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_09: This is no easy feat, but I’m sure you can do it.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_d_10: Keep tossing those Poké Balls, and don’t give up![VAR 0114(002A)]
